statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -7 \\ -10 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ 9 \\ 16 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -7 \\ -10 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ 9 \\ 16 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
